parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The domain name. You can specify only one domain name in each request.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: NextPageToken
parameters.description:
A pagination token. When you call this operation, up to 5,000 rows of data can be returned per query. If the number of rows exceeds 5,000, the response includes a pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results.

When you specify the token in the next query, data continues to be obtained from the end of the previous query.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm:ss*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
